hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Farore's Wind# and #the Song of Time#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

HC (Malon).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Heart Container# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Wallet# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Hover Boots#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Ice Arrows Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #an Ocarina# and #the Boomerang#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Serenade of Water#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Hover Boots#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Sun's Song# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Mido's house#.
